attributes.action: create a non-voting part of the Electoral Roll so resident foreign nationals can be identified for credit scoring purposes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently, most foreign UK residents are not eligible to register on the Electoral Roll, and as a consequence are scored negatively on their credit scores.

The most logical solution to this would be to create a non-voting section of the electoral roll where foreigners could identify where they live, but of course not be allowed to vote.
